div.h2: Inspiring our Students to Learn, Dream and Achieve

span.a: MEMORIAL DAY - ALL DISTRICT SITES CLOSED
EARLY RELEASE ALL SCHOOLS ES 1:40 PM, MS 2:40 PM, HS 1:00 PM
EARLY RELEASE ALL SCHOOLS ES 1:40 PM, MS 2:40 PM, HS 1:00 PM
EARLY RELEASE ALL SCHOOLS ES 1:40 PM, MS 2:40 PM, HS 1:00 PM
STUDENTS LAST DAY - END 2ND SEMESTER (93 DAYS)

img.alt: Free Grab n' Go Meals for Kids

a.span: Click for Free Meals for Kids. | Haga clic para obtener comidas gratis para nios.

div.p: The School District of Manatee County is providing Free Grab 'n Go meals for students 18 years and younger. El Distrito Escolar del Condado de Manatee est proporcionando comidas gratis para llevar para estudiantes de 18 aos o menos.

a.title: Go to comments for Click for Free Meals for Kids. | Haga clic para obtener comidas gratis para nios.

a.span: Manatee County is hiring teachers! Click here for more information.

div.p: Join us for our Virtual Teacher Job Fair on May 8, from 9am - 12pm. We will be interviewing for all K-12th grade subject areas and offering contracts during the event. Due to the current stay-at-home order, this event will take place virtually. To register, please call (941)708-8770 x41052 or email stromans@manateeschools.net.

a.title: Go to comments for Manatee County is hiring teachers! Click here for more information.

a.span: Click for SDMC Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates. | Haga clic para obtener las actualizaciones de SDMC Coronavirus (COVID-19).

div.p: This is your home for information about the Coronavirus as it relates to the School District of Manatee County. Esta es su casa para obtener informacin sobre el Coronavirus en relacin con el Distrito Escolar del Condado de Manatee.

a.title: Go to comments for Click for SDMC Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates. | Haga clic para obtener las actualizaciones de SDMC Coronavirus (COVID-19).

img.alt: Be ready when something suspicious happens.

a.span: Click for FortifyFL App. | Haga clic para la aplicacin FortifyFL.

div.p: FortifyFL is a suspicious activity reporting tool that allows you to send information to the appropriate law enforcement agencies and school officials. FortifyFL es una herramienta para reportar actividades sospechosas que te permite enviar informacin a las agencias del cumplimiento de la ley apropiadas y a oficiales escolares.

a.title: Go to comments for Click for FortifyFL App. | Haga clic para la aplicacin FortifyFL.

a.aria-label: 2018-2019 School, District and State Report Cards Image

img.alt: 2018-2019 School, District and State Report Cards

a.span: 2018-2019 School, District and State Report Cards

p.span: The Florida Department of Education provides these annual reports to offer greater transparency into how Floridas districts and schools are doing with regard to student achievement and success.

a.title: Go to comments for 2018-2019 School, District and State Report Cards
Subscribe to RSS Feed - District Hot Topics
a.span: Subscribe to RSS Feed - District Hot Topics

div.p:
The School District of Manatee County makes every effort to ensure that published information is accurate and current. However, the District makes no claims, promises, or guarantees about the absolute accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the contents of this website, and expressly disclaims liability for errors and omissions in the content of this website. Any person or entity that relies on any information obtained from this system does so at his or her own risk. Under Florida law, e-mail addresses are public records. If you do not want your e-mail address released in response to a public records request, do not send electronic mail regarding official business to the District or any of its employees. Instead, contact the District or individual employee by phone or in writing.
Purposes for the Collection of Social Security Numbers
